short_summary: Repair of wharf in Hay River, Northwest Territories
description: Repair of wharf in Hay River, Northwest Territories. The work covered under this contract consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material in strict accordance with specifications and accompanying drawings and subject to all terms and conditions of contract.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

### Title

* EW038-231372: Wharf Repair in Hay River, Northwest Territories

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3908743574-Doc3908756048
* **Tender Solicitation Number**: WS3908743574
* **Publication Date**: 01 May 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 20 June 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 25 April 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 31 October 2024

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: N/A
* **Regions of Delivery**: Hay River, Northwest Territories
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Hector Ho, SPAC/PSPC
* **Email**: [hector.ho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hector.ho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: N/A
* **Fax**: N/A

### Notice and Tender Information

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Tender Description**: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires the repair of a wharf in Hay River, Northwest Territories. The work covered under this contract consists of furnishing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and material in accordance with specifications and accompanying drawings.
* **Site Visit**: A highly recommended site visit will take place on 9 June 2023 at 11:00 AM EDT. Interested bidders are expected to meet at the Administration Building at the Hay River Canadian Coast Guard Base in Hay River, NT.

### Tender Requirements

* Tenders must be received by 20 June 2023, 2:00 PM EDT.
* Late bids will be declared non-responsive.
* Tenders must include all necessary supporting documentation.
